Yeah it kind of sounded like Kate but that is so close to my name and beings they said it about 4 seconds after I turned on the radio and I hadnt even said a word at that point but to announce that I was doing a recorded session before I even started.
   
  Thanks for listening Rees
   
  Kay

Wiliam Clarke <reesclarke_69@...> wrote:
            "Hello Kay" or "Hello Kate", but since you where doing the session, I say it was "hello Kay"
  Good file!  Good Catch!
